snippet.title: Wingspan - Gamescom 2019 - Teaser Trailer - Digital Edition
snippet.description:
Find out more and add to Wishlist here: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1054490
Talk with us: https://discord.gg/zFNSqhG
You are bird enthusiasts—researchers, bird watchers, ornithologists, and collectors—seeking to discover and attract the best birds to your network of wildlife preserves. Each bird extends a chain of powerful combinations in one of your habitats. 

This is a digital adaptation of Wingspan, a competitive, medium-weight, card-driven, engine-building board game from Stonemaier Games. Wingspan is the winner of the prestigious 2019 Kennerspiel des Jahres award.

Draw from hundreds of unique, animated bird cards.
Hear real life sound recordings of the birds you encounter in the game.
Play against AI or other people online and offline.
